backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the workout scheduling app's backend: data types (WorkoutSchedule, UserProfile, Tier), persistent state maps, motivational message seeding, access control integration, and API endpoints for schedules, profiles, and tier progression.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features — fixing root route redirect reliability in App.tsx and ensuring staleTime/invalidation consistency in useQueries.ts — to their test IDs and affected files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference for the current state and purpose of each component, page, hook, and utility in the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, primary, card, chart, and sidebar color roles.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the Daily Grind PWA, linking the manifest, setting theme/apple meta tags, and mounting the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Daily Grind defining standalone display mode, orange theme color, dark background, and a single 256×256 maskable app icon.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service Worker that schedules motivational workout push notifications every 6 hours using setInterval, responds to START/STOP/TEST messages from the main app, and handles notification click to focus or open the app window.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router app setup with five routes: root `/` redirects to `/today`, plus dedicated routes for Today, Schedule, Progress, and Settings; wrapped in ThemeProvider, QueryClientProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: App shell component rendering a sticky header with logo and desktop nav, a mobile bottom nav bar, and a main content area; nav links highlight the active route and are only shown when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps children with authentication and profile checks, showing a loading spinner, login screen, or profile setup modal as appropriate before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state during authentication and clearing the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: A landing/login page displaying the app logo, feature highlights, and a login button for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for first-time users to set their display name and notification preference, saving the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/TierBadge.tsx: Defines 22 ranked tiers with associated styles and renders a styled badge (compact or full) displaying a tier's icon, name, and visual theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and status state, persisting identity across page reloads via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages browser notification permissions and scheduling, syncing enabled state with the user's backend profile and exposing enable/disable/test actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on workout schedules, user profiles, motivational messages, and tier management, all backed by an ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including colors, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Progress page that displays weekly workout completion stats, current streak, and a day-by-day breakdown grid using data from workout schedule and user profile queries.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Schedule page that renders a per-day workout schedule list with inline editing, creation, deletion, and expand/collapse functionality, protected by AuthGuard.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page that allows users to evaluate and advance their fitness tier and toggle browser push notification reminders, showing current tier progress.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysWorkout.tsx: React page that displays the current day's workout schedule entry, allows marking it complete/incomplete, and shows a refreshable motivational message banner fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Utility module for managing browser push notifications via a service worker, exposing functions to register the SW, request notification permission, and send start/stop/test messages to the SW.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, with helpers to persist and retrieve those values via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom fonts (Inter, Barlow Condensed), extended border radii, box shadows, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking version 23 of 'Daily Grind', listing existing features, architectural notes, and a known cache-invalidation bug on the Today page after schedule mutations.
